pageContent: Purpose of review: Prostate biopsy has evolved from a paradigm of a small number of random biopsies to one of systematic, numeric, and anatomic strategy. Over the past several years, the data have demonstrated the importance of purposeful biopsy strategies for detecting, accurately grading, and staging prostate cancer in varying patient populations. We review the optimal strategies for prostate biopsy given various clinical situations.
